TopicTitle: Help with MechJeb2 Limite Throttle Ti feature

Articles.Content: Hey, I'm having a small problem with KSP's MechJeb2 mod. Out of the blue, the "Limit Throttle to" feature just stopped working. I first uninstalled and reinstalled MechJeb2 via CKAN, which didn't work. I deleted all mods and reinstalled just MechJeb2 and Module Manager, that didn't work either. Even when I uninstalled the game, deleted all its files, and reinstalled the game from scratch manually, MechJeb2 still didn't work. I have no idea how to fix this and I couldn't find anything in KSP's LOG files about a possible MechJeb2 error. Can you help me out? Maybe I'm not sure how to fix it, as stupid as it may be, but I've been using MechJeb2 for years. Thanks in advance.
